document.full_text: in a muddy slum at the edge of ivory coast's main city, palm leaves stuck in reddish mounds of earth mark the mass graves of locals killed by rampaging gunmen.
document.title: as bodies pile up, ivorians fear reprisals
lines_and_colors: in a muddy slum at the edge of ivory coast's main city, palm leaves stuck in reddish mounds of earth mark the mass graves of locals killed by rampaging gunmen.
